verses.verse: All <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I <WH595> command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117> shall ye observe <WH8104> to do, <WH6213> that <WH4616> ye may live, <WH2421> and multiply, <WH7235> and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> unto your fathers. <WH1>

And thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH853> all <WH3605> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> led <WH1980> thee these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness, <WH4057> to <WH4616> humble <WH6031> thee, and to prove <WH5254> thee, to know <WH3045> <WH853> what <WH834> was in thine heart, <WH3824> whether thou wouldest keep <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> or <WH518> not. <WH3808>

And he humbled <WH6031> thee, and suffered thee to hunger, <WH7456> and fed <WH398> thee with <WH854> manna, <WH4478> which <WH834> thou knewest <WH3045> not, <WH3808> neither <WH3808> did thy fathers <WH1> know; <WH3045> that <WH4616> he might make thee know <WH3045> that <WH3588> man <WH120> doth not <WH3808> live <WH2421> by <WH5921> bread <WH3899> only, <WH905> but <WH3588> by <WH5921> every <WH3605> word that proceedeth out <WH4161> of the mouth <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> doth man <WH120> live. <WH2421>
Thy raiment <WH8071> waxed not old <WH1086> <WH3808> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> thee, neither <WH3808> did thy foot <WH7272> swell, <WH1216> these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>

Thou shalt also consider <WH3045> in <WH5973> thine heart, <WH3824> that, <WH3588> as <WH834> a man <WH376> chasteneth <WH3256> <WH853> his son, <WH1121> so the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> chasteneth <WH3256> thee.
Therefore thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH853> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in his ways, <WH1870> and to fear <WH3372> him.

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> bringeth <WH935> thee into <WH413> a good <WH2896> land, <WH776> a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water, <WH4325> of fountains <WH5869> and depths <WH8415> that spring out <WH3318> of valleys <WH1237> and hills; <WH2022>
A land <WH776> of wheat, <WH2406> and barley, <WH8184> and vines, <WH1612> and fig trees, <WH8384> and pomegranates; <WH7416> a land <WH776> of oil <WH8081> olive, <WH2132> and honey; <WH1706>

A land <WH776> wherein <WH834> thou shalt eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarceness, <WH4544> thou shalt not <WH3808> lack <WH2637> any <WH3605> thing in it; a land <WH776> whose <WH834> stones <WH68> are iron, <WH1270> and out of whose hills <WH4480> <WH2042> thou mayest dig <WH2672> brass. <WH5178>

When thou hast eaten <WH398> and art full, <WH7646> then thou shalt bless <WH1288> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> for <WH5921> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which <WH834> he hath given <WH5414> thee.

Beware <WH8104> that thou forget not <WH6435> <WH7911> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> in not <WH1115> keeping <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> and his judgments, <WH4941> and his statutes, <WH2708> which <WH834> I <WH595> command <WH6680> thee this day: <WH3117>
Lest <WH6435> when thou hast eaten <WH398> and art full, <WH7646> and hast built <WH1129> goodly <WH2896> houses, <WH1004> and dwelt <WH3427> therein;

And when thy herds <WH1241> and thy flocks <WH6629> multiply, <WH7235> and thy silver <WH3701> and thy gold <WH2091> is multiplied, <WH7235> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> thou hast is multiplied; <WH7235>

Then thine heart <WH3824> be lifted up, <WH7311> and thou forget <WH7911> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> which brought thee forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of bondage; <WH5650>

Who led <WH1980> thee through that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness, <WH4057> wherein were fiery <WH8314> serpents, <WH5175> and scorpions, <WH6137> and drought, <WH6774> where <WH834> there was no <WH369> water; <WH4325> who brought thee forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH4480> <WH6697> of flint; <WH2496>

Who fed <WH398> thee in the wilderness <WH4057> with manna, <WH4478> which <WH834> thy fathers <WH1> knew <WH3045> not, <WH3808> that <WH4616> he might humble <WH6031> thee, and that <WH4616> he might prove <WH5254> thee, to do thee good <WH3190> at thy latter end; <WH319>
And thou say <WH559> in thine heart, <WH3824> My power <WH3581> and the might <WH6108> of mine hand <WH3027> hath gotten <WH6213> me <WH853> this <WH2088> wealth. <WH2428>

But thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God: <WH430> for <WH3588> it is he <WH1931> that giveth <WH5414> thee power <WH3581> to get <WH6213> wealth, <WH2428> that <WH4616> he may establish <WH6965> <WH853> his covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> unto thy fathers, <WH1> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And it shall be, <WH1961> if <WH518> thou do at all forget <WH7911> <WH7911> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> and walk <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and serve <WH5647> them, and worship <WH7812> them, I testify <WH5749> against you this day <WH3117> that <WH3588> ye shall surely perish. <WH6> <WH6>

As the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> destroyeth <WH6> before your face, <WH4480> <WH6440> so <WH3651> shall ye perish; <WH6> because <WH6118> ye would not <WH3808> be obedient <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
